entry.title: Tencent intern
entry.content:
First Day ğŸ¦‹

On my first day at Tencent, I was shocked by two things. The first was that my work shifted to the field of LLM, which I had never encountered beforeğŸ˜µ. Essentially, my first day at Tencent marked the beginning of my journey into LLM. The second shock was the exceptionally high academic qualifications within the team, with degrees primarily from Tsinghua and top 985 universities at both undergraduate and postgraduate levelsğŸ˜¥. This was the first time I realized just how high the threshold for data science is. Nonetheless, this is a highly valuable experience, and with a sense of gratitude and perseverance, Iâ€™m gradually integrating into my workğŸ¤²ğŸ».

LLM Research

Half of my work involves collaborating with the experts from the neighboring machine learning algorithm team. One of the most striking things for me is the remarkable combination: top-tier experts paired with someone as inexperienced as I amğŸ¥¶. Some individuals may speak infrequently, but when they do, their words carry immense weight and value.

Agent Development

The other half of my work involves developing intelligent agents to embed into products. The product is already live internally and should be publicly released in the near futureğŸ¤”. During the busiest times, I developed three features in a single week, pushing over 1,000 lines of code. Fortunately, things have been relatively relaxed recently, which inspired me to tinker with my own blogğŸŒ´.

entry.title: SAP intern
entry.content:
SAP

â€¢ Fortune Global 500
â€¢ Enterprise-level product collaboration
â€¢ German company

Annual Event

During my internship, fortunately had the chance to attend this yearâ€™s annual event, â€œAll in AI,â€ where I listened to many insightful talks from industry leadersğŸ‘ğŸ».

SAP and me

I will always cherish my first internship, where I had a great mentor and friendly working atmosphereğŸ‘œ. Even though the work pace was relatively slow, the final products were meticulous. It taught me how a company producing enterprise-level products operates and functionsğŸ’.

Before this offer, I had received a few others, but none of them felt quite rightâ˜¹ï¸. I was ready to settle for the status quo, but one day, a call from the interviewer slowly changed the course of the next six monthsğŸ¤ŸğŸ»

Work Life Balance

The most unforgettable part was the food at SAP. In three months, the meals almost never repeated. I especially loved the light meals and Western food countersâ€”the presentation was always beautiful.

The most enjoyable thing each day is to make a cup of cappuccino, sit by the window, and start my work for the day.

A comfortable workspace always lifts my spiritsğŸ˜Š, especially with many green plants by the window purifying the airğŸŒ².

entry.title: Merry Christmas
entry.content:
Christmas

I often view the Christmas tree as a radiant symbol of hope and warmth, filling my heart with pure joyâœ¨. Perhaps itâ€™s the gifts adorning the branches, or maybe itâ€™s the enchanting melodies of Christmas carols that dance in the air. Regardless, I cherish every aspect of Christmas and its magnificent treesğŸŒ². Each year, I find myself celebrating this magical season with LYQ, and itâ€™s their delightful presence that fills my heart with anticipation for all the Christmases yet to comeğŸ’Œ.

Merry Christmas

2022.12.24

Even though the COVID-19 pandemic wasnâ€™t over at that time, we still went out together to celebrate Christmas.

entry.title: Studying in UESTC
entry.content:
UESTC

From Freshman to junior year

In 2021, entered UESTC with a college entrance exam score of 641.

In my freshman year, I found the school a bit dullâ€”it felt like I was still living the same boring life as in high school, even though I was already in universityğŸ¤¦ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸. Maybe it was because there were so few girls, and I only had few close friend who I really clicked withğŸ˜¢.

It wasnâ€™t until sophomore year that I gradually found my direction and rhythm. Of course, I would also go to the other main campus to attend concerts and social eventsğŸ˜.

Junior year was the most interesting for meâ€”I finally left Chengdu, a city I wasnâ€™t very fond ofğŸ¥², and as I started my internship, I experienced living independently for the first timeğŸ¥³.

Best friend in Uestc

She said we are destined to be friends. Totally moved by those words at that time. Actually we have been friends for three years in Uestc. Before the final exams every semester, we worked hard in library togetherğŸ™‡ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸. Thanks for your companyğŸ’“

Eat delicious food every weekendï½The summer was too hot, so I cooled off with some refreshing haitang tofu pudding.When the weather gets cold, I enjoy eating hotpot and barbecueğŸ˜‹

Ginkgo trees in autumn

The ginkgo photo shoot was taken for me by a very kind senior.Every autumn, when the ginkgo leaves turn yellow, many visitors come to the school to take photosğŸ

Eastern Suburb Memory in winter

One winter, a classmate suggested a photo shoot. Even though they were just practicing with me, I still held on with the spirit of a determined model and made sure we got the shotsğŸ¤¦ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸

entry.title: Hello Yaxin
entry.content:
Welcome to My Blog! This is my first post. I love pretty and shiny things, like Christmas trees, butterflies, and ice cubes sparkling in the sunlightâœ¨. Even though Iâ€™m aiming to become an AI engineer, I also have a casual love for Web development.

A brief understanding of meğŸ©°

MBTI is INFJ

The INFJ personality type is like a hidden gardenğŸŒ·, full of depth and mystery, where every thought and feeling blooms with purpose. They are dreamers, wrapped in a quiet empathy that flows like a gentle river, always seeking to understand the world and those around them on a deeper level. Their intuition is like stardust, guiding them toward paths others might not see, and their hearts beat with a deep compassionâ¤ï¸â€ğŸ”¥, always striving to make the world a more beautiful, meaningful place.
